author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Adieu and Thank You, Kepler
description:
On October 30, 2018, NASA announced that its Kepler space telescope has run out of fuel and that it will retire the spacecraft.
Here are a few things, Kepler taught us in its nine years of deep space
